activities: Mail Metrics specializes in CRM (Customer Relationship Management) and email marketing in the U.S., European and Asian markets with coverage worldwide. For over 10 years, Mail Metrics has been assisting clients analyze and understand their market along with user behavior in order to define and develop a CRM and messaging strategy to meet their goals. With the right advice and CRM solutions, Mail Metrics helps various industries to increase the value of their marketing data: centralization, segmentation, automation, and performance monitoring. Mail Metrics also assists its clients by offering customized emailing solutions and services to prepare, submit, and monitor email campaigns and newsletters.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
